snippet.title: Gameplay introduction to Egglia: Legend of the Redcap
snippet.description:
A quick look at the basic gameplay elements of Egglia: Legend of the Redcap. Embark on exciting turn-based RPG adventures against ever-tougher enemies. Hatch eggs to unlock new lands to explore. Manage resources and grow items to help you progress through the game and evolve your spirit helpers. Grow your village by building houses for Chabo’s friends and customizing them as you like. And remember, these are just the basics! 

New JRPG Egglia: Legend of the Redcap will be released in English on iOS and Android in August. For more information, visit http://egglia.jp/eng/ or follow Egglia on Twitter at https://twitter.com/EGGLIA_STAFF
